name: Pixel Technology Solutions
description: backend solutions with a frontend vision
overview:
Pixel Technology Solutions is a small startup technology firm in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. They specialize in consulting and implementation of technology services and products much needed by small businesses, individuals, and large fund raising events.

Their approach to quickly adopting cheap and open-source state-of-the-art compatible technology products allows for a competitive advantage among IT consulting firms, and also sets their clients ahead of their competitors. \Their projects range from creating simple presentation slides to handling domain maintenance to audio, video, and sound at events, and more.
